src:
Unai Emery dan Keputusan-Keputusan Anehnya, Dipecat Lebih Cepat?
04 Nov 2019, 11:30 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Unai Emery mulai kehilangan dukungan sebagai pelatih Arsenal. Seiring hasil minor yang diraih The Gunners, rumor pemecatan Emery pun terus menguat. Dia dianggap tidak cocok untuk Arsenal.
Musim ini adalah musim kedua Emery sebagai bos Arsenal, tapi masih belum ada tanda-tanda perkembangan yang siginifikan. Arsenal masih sama, punya masalah yang sama seperti tahun-tahun terakhir Arsene Wenger.
Emery sebenarnya punya riwayat karier impresif. Dia berjaya bersama Sevilla, lalu membuktikan kebolehannya di PSG. Namun, beberapa kekurangan Emery perlahan terbongkar.
Ada sejumlah keputusan aneh Emery yang terkadang sulit dipahami. Apa saja? Baca selengkapnya di bawah ini ya, Bolaneters!
text:
Unai Emery and Odd Decisions, Fired Faster?
Nov 04 2019, 11:30 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Unai Emery is starting to lose support as Arsenal coach. As the minor results achieved by the Gunners, the rumors of the dismissal of Emery continued to strengthen. He was considered unsuitable for Arsenal.
This season is Emery's second season as Arsenal boss, but there are still no signs of significant development. Arsenal are still the same, have the same problems as Arsene Wenger's last years.
Emery actually has an impressive career history. He triumphed with Sevilla, then prove his ability at PSG. However, some of Emery's shortcomings slowly revealed.
There are a number of strange decisions Emery sometimes difficult to understand. Anything? Read below, Bolaneters!
